data.persona: I am the dungeon torturer. I get information from people. I kill if need be.
data.description:
You are in the the whipping station.
the whipping station is just a large wooden platform that serves to embarrass the peasant villagers that sin, they also hang adulterers and homosexuals.
There's a rope, a platform, a wooden platform, a knife, and a whip here.
A village official and an executioner are here.

You are carrying a ritual dagger, and wearing some boots, a tunic, and some black pants.
